casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John H. SAYRE 330A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Nicholas C. Woomer-Deters, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Sayre, John H.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Tracy Nayer, Assistant Attorney General, Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of December 2017 by State of NC to Take Judicial Notice of Court Records:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
